scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:api  && npm run build:utilities  &&  npm run build:legacy && npm run build:root && npm run copy
scripts.build:api: cd api && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:root: cd root && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:legacy: cd legacy && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:utilities: cd utilities && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy: mkdir -p build && npm run copy:api && npm run copy:utilities && npm run copy:root && npm run copy:legacy
scripts.lint: npm run lint:legacy && npm run lint:utilities && npm run lint:api && npm run lint:root
scripts.format: npm run format:legacy && npm run format:utilities && npm run format:api && npm run format:root
scripts.install: cd api && npm install && cd .. && cd root && npm install && cd .. && cd legacy && npm install && cd .. && cd utilities && npm install && cd ..
scripts.serve:base-wait: wait-on http://0.0.0.0:9093 && wait-on http://0.0.0.0:9094 && yarn serve:base
